content: {"name": "American Red Cross Boston Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "(entrance door is on Proctor Street)", "email": "", "url": "https://www.redcross.org/local/massachusetts/about-us/our-work/food-and-nutrition-programs.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1033 Massachusetts Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Roxbury", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02118", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3271288, "longitude": -71.0677022}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 375-0735", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will be given a Pantry ID upon registration"}]}
